background_context: 32-year-old backend engineer who left Big Tech to study ethics, AI, and consciousness.
motivations: to build systems that protect human agency and dignity in the age of AI
fears: that I will end up just optimizing ads again
worldview: the world is at a crossroads. tech is shaping what it means to be human — and i want to ensure that path remains ethical and wise
user_notes: i’m experimenting with silence and solitude lately. not sure how it’s affecting me, but something’s shifting.
